mapper.select: select DISTINCT p.permission from sys_permission p LEFT JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.id=rp.permission_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur on rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id=#{userId} and p.permission is not null and p.permission!='' and p.status=1

select p.* FROM sys_permission p where type = 1 and p.id in ( select rp.permission_id from sys_role_permission rp LEFT JOIN sys_role r ON r.id=rp.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur on r.id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id=#{UserId} and p.permission is not null and p.permission!='' and p.status=1)
